OrgName: MediaSpan Group, Inc. (formerly MediaSpan Online Services)
activities:
MediaSpan Group, Inc. (MG) collects and stores personal information from citizens of the U.S. as well as citizens of countries that are members of the European Union (EU) online via its Online Services division in two ways:
1) From their clients and potential clients for the purpose of notification and marketing of MG's services.
2) On behalf of MG's clients for the purpose of listener (and customer) loyalty management programs.

Both of these activities are on an "opt-in" basis where individuals are signing up to either receive additional information or to participate in activities associated with MOS, and their client's, website(s).  Access to update personal information and to modify "opt-in" choice are presented online as well as via any e-mai correspondences.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data processed by MG is primarily collected on-line while some data, mostly provided by clients, is collected off-line.  However, off-line data is only added to our databases when such data i
recoursemech: the American Arbitration Association and JAMS.
